sentences.cn: “ 老贝勒的密探, ” 他的情报提供人说,“呀哈!

sentences.en: Could you Be my language informant for Dutch?
sentences.cn: 你愿意为我作荷兰语的资料提供人 吗 ?

sentences.en: He charged her not to reveal the identity of the informant.
sentences.cn: 他告诫她不要透露提供消息者的身份.

sentences.en: He was working for me, he was informant.
sentences.cn: 他在为我工作, 他是我地线人.

sentences.en: I feel that what the informant says may well be true.
sentences.cn: 我认为那个提供消息的人说的可能是真的.

sentences.en: I found out what happened from my informant who saw it happen.
sentences.cn: 我从目击这件事发生的消息提供者那儿探明了事情真相.

sentences.en: Now , BilI's been briefing me, of course, but this guy's your informant, right?
sentences.cn: 比尔跟我简报过了那家伙是你的线民?

sentences.en: One of the witnesses was a paid informant for the FBI.
sentences.cn: 目击者之一是联邦调查局出钱雇用的线人。

sentences.en: The anthropologist transcribed the sentences of the native informant.
sentences.cn: 人类学家给那些记录当地人信息的句子标音.

sentences.en: The foreman decided to take the informant's advice.
sentences.cn: 工头决定接受线人的意见.

sentences.en: The journalist did not want to reveal the identity of his informant.
sentences.cn: 那个新闻工作者不想透露消息提供人的身份.

sentences.en: The name of the informant must not be disclosed.
sentences.cn: 告密者的名字一定要公之于众.

sentences.en: The sound of our informant's voice directed him to the library.
sentences.cn: 向我们报告的人的声音把他引到书房来.

sentences.en: They suspected that he was the informant.
Unfortunately, my informant is no longer among the living.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是, 我的线人遭遇了不幸.

sentences.en: We trusted our informant , Alonzo , to you, and you got his whole family killed?
sentences.cn: 我们信任我们的线人, 但次你害我们的线人全家被杀?
